Title: Creates the division of regulatory review and economic growth
Summary: Creates the division of regulatory review and economic growth to review regulatory processes and permit requirements in order to facilitate economic growth; imposes a two-for-one rule reduction requirement.
LawCode: Add Art 43 §§930 - 937, Exec L; amd §202, add Art 2-A §220, St Ad Proc Act; amd §§86, 87 & 88, add §88-a, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the state administrative procedure act and the legislative law, in relation to the division of regulatory review and economic growth and imposing a two-for-one rule reduction requirement
